Jeremiah or Jeremias__48.10__Deceitfully: : In the Greek, negligently. The work of God here spoken of, is the punishment of the Moabites.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__48.11__And hath rested upon his lees: : That is, remained in its bad morals; as wine not decanted has its lees mixed and remains muddy.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__48.13__Of Bethel: : That is, of their golden calf which they worshipped in Bethel.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__48.25__The horn of Moab is cut off: : That is, the strength of Moab is cut off. A metaphor drawn from animals whose strength is in their horns.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__48.43__Fear: : That is, the sword of the enemy.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__48.43__The snare: : That is, the ambushes laid by the enemy.
